text: Standard has dropped after renovating. But staff are nice so 4 stars
The food was peaked and the service was amazing

I came to dine last week and ordered a pot of Chinese tea. There was no price on the menu. It used to be charged $3, and the bill also stated it was $3. I came back today and the same tea was priced at $10 at checkout without any prior notice. After asking, I was informed by the female boss that "the price will increase starting today." This kind of practice without clearly marking the price or explaining it in advance is disappointing.
It‚Äôs important to operate with integrity. It‚Äôs hard to look back this way.
